description: Sign in with Google - Best for consumer apps and Google Workspace integration

steps: Create a new project or select existing project in Google Cloud Console
Copy Client ID and Client Secret

replaceInRedirectUris.YOUR-PROJECT-REF: Replace with your Supabase project reference ID

envVars.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID: The OAuth Client ID from Google Cloud Console
envVars.GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET: The OAuth Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

scopes.description: Default scopes provide basic user information (email, name, profile picture)

commonIssues.solution: Ensure the redirect URI in your app matches exactly what's configured in Google Cloud Console
Configure OAuth consent screen in Google Cloud Console under 'OAuth consent screen'
Enable Google+ API in Google Cloud Console under 'APIs & Services' > 'Library'

useCases: Google Workspace integration for enterprise AI tools
Quick sign-up for AI SaaS products
Multi-tenant AI platforms with Google accounts
